mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, d.dept_name, r.rank_name, e.emp_status FROM EMP e, DEPT d, rank r WHERE e.dept_no = d.dept_no AND e.rank_no = r.rank_no ORDER BY emp_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp (emp_no, emp_name, emp_pw, emp_status, dept_no, rank_no, emp_job, emp_hiredate, emp_retiredate, emp_email, emp_tel, emp_auth, emp_picture_path) VALUES(#{seq_emp}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_pw}, #{emp_status}, #{dept_no}, #{rank_no}, #{emp_job}, #{emp_hiredate}, #{emp_retiredate}, #{emp_email}, #{emp_tel}, #{emp_auth}. #{emp_picture_path})
